1: dang ldan par//bden bral phyi rol gnas pa <mistake>yang//me</mistake> mtshams pa <mistake>yin</mistake> <mistake>non</mistake> pa yi//dbus las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//byang las dang po bzung nas su//sgra yig a dang ldan pa yis//byang nas
2: gnyis pa gang yin pa//shar las gsum pa gang yin <mistake>dang//byang</mistake> nas dang po yang yin te//dbus las dang <mistake>pa</mistake> bzung nas su//byang nas dbu ma pa la yang //dbus las tha <mistake>md</mistake> dang sbyor te//yi ge i
3: dang gcig par 'dod//lho nas dbu ma bzung nas <mistake>su //tsheg</mistake> drag lci <mistake>bkho</mistake> na'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje <mistake>'zin</mistake> pas gsungs so//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//thig le u
4: yig sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu ma pa bzung ba//me mtshams pa stan ldan pa <mistake>yi//ldo</mistake> las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//dbus las dang po bzung nas su//byang nas dbu ma pa la <mistake>yang//dbus</mistake>
5: las tha ma dang sbyor <mistake>la //sgra</mistake> yig <mistake>ai</mistake> dang ldan par bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas <mistake>gsrungs</mistake> so//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas//sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya//dbus
6: las dang po bzung ba <mistake>dang//byang</mistake> nas <mistake>kbu</mistake> ma pa <mistake>yi</mistake> yang //dbus las tha ma pa sbyor <mistake>la// sgya</mistake> yig <mistake>yi</mistake> dang ldan par bya//de ni <mistake>las</mistake> gnyis <mistake>brdon</mistake> byas te//dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba la//thig le nga ro
7: ldan byas <mistake>la//d</mistake> ni drug por yongs grags so//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//rlung <mistake>mcshams</mistake> phyi rol pa bzung <mistake>nas// tshig</mistake> drag o yig sbyor bar bya//dbus
8: las dang po bzung nas ni//byang las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i//dbus kyi <mistake>tham</mistake> bzung ba <mistake>dang//nub</mistake> las tha ma bzung ba la//sgra yig e ni <mistake>sbor</mistake> bar <mistake>byas//me</mistake> yi 'dab mar gnas pa la//sgra yig a
